title: Analyst no longer believes Apple will launch an 11-inch iPad Pro with miniLED display
content:
Last year, rumors pointed out Apple was readying an 11-inch iPad Pro replacement with a miniLED display. Now, it seems this is not the case anymore as a supply chain analyst is reporting that the company will stick with the LCD technology for this smaller tablet.

moreâ€¦

The post Analyst no longer believes Apple will launch an 11-inch iPad Pro with miniLED display appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Rumors pointed out Apple was readying an 11-inch iPad Pro replacement with a miniLED display. Now, it seems the plan has changed.
